metadata.title: CVE-2012-0208 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Grid Engine component in Oracle SunProducts Suite 6.1 and 6.2 allows remote authenticated users to affectconfidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related toqrsh.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0208` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gridengine-client - 8.1.9+dfsg-7build1
gridengine-common - 8.1.9+dfsg-7build1
gridengine-drmaa1.0 - 8.1.9+dfsg-7build1
gridengine-exec - 8.1.9+dfsg-7build1
gridengine-master - 8.1.9+dfsg-7build1
gridengine-qmon - 8.1.9+dfsg-7build1
libdrmaa1.0-java - 8.1.9+dfsg-7build1
libdrmaa1.0-ruby - 8.1.9+dfsg-7build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gridengine package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.1.9+dfsg-7build1').
